title: Winding up of overseas companies.
content: 362. Where a company incorporated outside the Republic or which has been carrying on business in the Republic, ceases to carry on business in the Republic, it may be wound up by the Court under the provisions of this Law, notwithstanding that it has been dissolved or otherwise ceases to exist as a company under or by virtue of the Laws of the country under which it was incorporated. PART IX GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO REGISTRATION Registration offices.
